name: STEVE (Assassin Squid)
description:
A 2 player split screen wave survival game where you play as a banana and a potato and your enemies range from explosive hamster zombies to purple turtles. Yeah it's kinda weird. Pretty fun to play it with friends though. 

I made this game based off of some very random ideas I got from a friend. It's a very small game and I made it for them as a Christmas present.  Any donations go to getting them something awesome for their birthday this year so feel free to wish them a happy birthday if you'd like
